sourcesContent:
<template>
  <icon-with-label-menu-item
    :icon="icon"
    :label="label"
    :permission="permission"
    @click="handleClick"
  />
</template>

<script>
import IconWithLabelMenuItem from "@/components/IconWithLabelMenuItem.vue";
import VueToast2 from "vue-toast2";

export default {
  components: {
    IconWithLabelMenuItem,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      icon: require("@/assets/maison.jpg"),
      label: "Accueil",
      permission: true,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    handleClick() {
      if (this.permission) {
        VueToast2.success(`Ouverture de la page ${this.label}`, { timeout: 5000 });
        // Ajoutez ici la logique pour rediriger vers la page "/home"
      }
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
/* Importez directement le style ici si n√©cessaire */
</style>
